format is strictly prohibited 2025 mevlinn gusick mevvsan all rights reserved page 2 what you ll need materials needed yarn size 2 75 mm crochet hook yarn and colors epic polyester fiberfill a 100% cotton aran/#4 weight yarn scissors 50g = 75 meters 82 yards yarn needle 031 cardinal red 8g stitch marker optional 127 fawn brown 7g off white 1g yarn alternatives to make sure the beret and baguette fit your pigeon i strongly suggest using the same yarn you used to make your pigeon for the best results however if you do decide to use a different type of yarn the best way to keep the size accurate is making sure the yardage per gram for both yarns are as close as possible also any 100% acrylic yarn in the same suggested weight would be a great alternative to cotton if you use the recommended amount for the cotton yarn you should have enough plus some extra because cotton yarn tends to weigh more than acrylic finished size if the recommended yarn thickness and hook size are used the finished beret will have approximately a 6 5 cm 2 5 inches diameter and the baguette will be 10 5 cm 4 1 inches long abbreviations pattern is in us crochet terms magic_ring magic_ring chain chain stitch st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet round round yo yarn over * when you see instructions written between parenthesis you will work these instructions as many times as the pattern tells you to increase single_crochet increase two single_crochet in one stitch decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet two stitches together designer note when i crochet amigurumi i let the wrong side face outwards all the photos you will see in this tutorial are worked this way and it is my personal preference when it comes to making amigurumi if you choose to crochet with the traditional right side facing outwards there will be no significant difference regarding how the finished piece will turn out you can find a link to a youtube video with more information about this on page 5 finished items made from this pattern may be sold provided credit is given to mevvsan with a link to www mevvsan com rewriting redistribution or resale of this pattern
